text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cqfmeasures/CodeSystem/quality-programs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
mips MIPSMerit-Based Incentive Payment System (MIPS)
ep-ec EP/ECCMS Promoting Interoperability Eligible Professionals/Eligible Clinicians.
eh-cah EH/CAHCMS Promoting Interoperability Eligible Hospitals or Critical Access Hospitals.
qpp QPPQuality Payment Program.
aapm AAPMAdvanced Alternative Payment Models.
cpcp CPC+Comprehensive Primary Care Plus (CPC+)

name: QualityPrograms
title: Quality Programs Codes
description: The following defines the programs associated with a measure. Identified quality programs are neither exhaustive nor prescriptive. Specific quality program codes are not in scope for this IG.

concept.definition: CMS Promoting Interoperability Eligible Professionals/Eligible Clinicians.
CMS Promoting Interoperability Eligible Hospitals or Critical Access Hospitals.
